description:
Panty and Stocking take on Scanty and Kneesocks in a scandalous beach volleyball tournament. On the flip side, Stocking falls in love with a super stinky ghost!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: If the Angels Wore Swimsuits / Ghost: The Phantom of Daten City
Tenshi ga Mizugi ni Kigaetara / Ghost: Daten City no Maboroshi
天使が水着に着替えたら / ゴースト ~ダテンシティの幻~
천사가 수영복으로 갈아입으면 / 고스트 ~다텐 시티의 환상~
